markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. It is a random map representing foothills encounters.

## Usages

Foothills is used in the scripted interaction [Boa Hika Pass](/boaHikaPass/).

## Behind the scenes

* Variant 1 is one of the many zones where the parallax layer doesn't completely fill the background area, leaving black bars around the edge of the area.
